prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon that changes colors with the seasons and flutters gracefully.
Imagine a Pokemon that can create stunning light displays with its colorful wings.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant patterns and a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in sunny environments and loves to dance in the air.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon with a unique camouflage ability to blend in with flowers.
Give me a Pokemon that can communicate with other creatures through mesmerizing wing patterns.
Make a butterfly Pokemon that symbolizes joy and is often found in gardens.
